trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around June 22nd 2013
Summary: bright lights in sky getting very bright then getting very dim multi lights
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife went out to look at the bright moon and noticed a bright light in the sky traveling in a northern maybe a little northwest direction towards the big dipper. The light seem to be very high and a steady glow not like the airplanes we see on a normal bases. We seen what must have been 6 or maybe 7 different lights coming towards the big dipper from the south towards the handle of the dipper the glow from the objects got bright the it faded in to the dark sky. We got some video or the lights will try to post it as well
